name: Tank Fight (Tristan (MuchSilver))
description:
Avoid mines and collect power ups hidden in walls to get ahead of you're opponent.

Controls:

Player 1: 

W: Move forward

A: Rotate counter-clockwise

D: Rotate clockwise

S:  Move Backwards

F:  Shoot

Player 2:

Up arrow: Move forward

Left arrow: Rotate counter-clockwise

Right arrow: Rotate clockwise

Down arrow:  Move Backwards

/: Shoot
